author: mor
msg: Fixed a bad indentation. I wasn't really sure whether to keep the indentation to 2 or 4 spaces because it is inconsistent throughout the file. Generally we keep the indentation to 4 spaces in XML and also I have less modifications with latter so I went with 4 spaces indentation.
